alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Inland Nassau; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 12:24AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nassau, northeastern Bradford, southern Baker, northeastern Union, northwestern Clay and southwestern Duval Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1224 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Raiford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Raiford, Middleburg, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Maxville, Olustee, Cecil Field, Sanderson, Baldwin and Lawtey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Inland Nassau; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval
